description:
Download a trial version now to see for yourself how well it works.

The trial version includes a full copy of Window Clippings, but running it without a license produces screenshots with a watermark. Once your license key has been entered into Window Clippings you will be ready to take beautiful screenshots for your website, blog, documentation, book project, or whatever your needs may be.

Window Clippings 3 is designed for Windows 7 and Windows Vista. If you're running Windows XP please use Window Clippings 2.1. A Window Clippings 3 license includes a license for Window Clippings 2 just in case you need it.
summary: Window Clippings 3.1 is here! The latest version of our popular screen capture tool for Windows produces screenshots that are so accurate and realistic you’ll want to click on the screenshot as if it’s the real thing!
author: Epsitec SA
